name: Destruction
description: Deals outstanding amounts of damage and possesses great survivability. Suitable for various combat scenarios

name: The Hunt
description: Deals extraordinary amounts of single-target damage. The main damage dealer against Elite Enemies

name: Erudition
description: Deals remarkable amounts of multi-target damage. The main damage dealer against groups of enemies

name: Harmony
description: Applies buffs to allies to improve the team's combat capacities

name: Nihility
description: Applies debuffs to enemies to reduce their combat capacities

name: Preservation
description: Possesses powerful defensive abilities to protect allies in various ways

name: Abundance
description: Heals allies and restores HP to the team
